name: Lunchtime (Whare Mātoro (Otago Games Space))
description:
Lunchtime!

As a trusty crane operator, it's your job to help your fellow construction worker reach the top of the tower where their sandwich is waiting for them!

Created during their second year of the Bachelor of Communication Design (Game Stream) at Te Pūkenga (Otago Polytechnic) by Shengyi Gong, John Lina and Samuel Galloway.
